metadata.description: QSO's collection of high-quality plugins for AI-powered presentations, deep research, and Volcengine AI capabilities

plugins.name: nanobanana-ppt
plugins.description: Generate professional PPT presentations using Google Nano Banana Pro AI via MCP. Supports multiple visual styles, fine-grained page allocation, and plugin-style dynamic style system.

plugins.name: deep-research
plugins.description: Conduct enterprise-grade research with multi-source synthesis, citation tracking, and verification. Supports 8-phase research pipeline with source credibility scoring, parallel retrieval, and reference materials preservation. Default output in Chinese with script-based HTML generation.

plugins.name: volengine-skills
plugins.description: Multi-skill plugin integrating Volcengine AI capabilities. Currently includes ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) for audio-to-text transcription with support for multiple languages and speakers.

plugins.name: ai-news-researcher
plugins.description: AI news researcher plugin for discovering, analyzing, and summarizing the latest AI industry news and trends. Features 7-phase workflow: multi-source data collection, intelligent filtering, topic prioritization, optional deep-research integration, and artifact indexing.
